common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"user_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a user."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by(depends on different APIs) partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token,  user_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm."}]
define: Get the item list of the product set, including item name, id, etc. (Only for TW, ID, TH)

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Invalid page_size, page_size must larger than 0 and cannot exceed {{limit}}

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: The item set {{item_set_id}} you provided is not exist

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: The API is not supported for current region

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: Too many requests, please try again later

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The identifier of the item set.

","name":"item_set_id","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"TiSmDYa"},{"description":"

Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is 0, if data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

","name":"offset","sample":"0","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"pRTwWnK"},{"description":"

Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the \"page_size\" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single \"page\" of data. The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100.

","name":"page_size","sample":"10","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"DSbFYRB"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"SJdkhBK"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fwFhJhW"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"ae9e59cf358b59d7f940552176cb9d01","type":"string","required":null,"key":"TxZYhxi"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"mWizeey","children":[{"description":"

This is to indicate whether the list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of data.

","name":"more","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"xeBQEYE"},{"description":"

If more is true, this value need set to next request offset.

","name":"next_offset","sample":"10","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"MBPhDGZ"},{"description":"","name":"list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"mciacz","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

","name":"item_id","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"xeiWQXK"},{"description":"

The shop id of this item.

","name":"shop_id","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"hfdyAWD"},{"description":"

Name of the item in local language.

","name":"name","sample":"test","type":"string","required":null,"key":"dZHyFPA"},{"description":"

The image url of this item.

","name":"image_url","sample":"https://cf.shopee.sg/file/id-11134104-7r98o-m9pjrv63z8lxe7","type":"string","required":null,"key":"sERiSnf"},{"description":"","name":"price_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"nnXXixt","children":[{"description":"

The three-digit code representing the currency unit used for the item.

","name":"currency","sample":"SGD","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fCazwbE"},{"description":"

The current price of the item in the listing currency. If product under an ongoing promotion, current_price will be the promotion price.

","name":"current_price","sample":"100.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"DxbYKiX"},{"description":"

The original price of the item in the listing currency.

","name":"original_price","sample":"120.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"HrFxyyc"}]},{"description":"","name":"affiliate_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"HzSmRWN","children":[{"description":"

The commission rate that the streamer can get, for example, 0.1 means 10%.

","name":"commission_rate","sample":"0.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"sfjEwsf"},{"description":"

Whether participate in a campaign project (generally, the commission will be higher)

","name":"is_campaign","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"rywJXWY"},{"description":"

MCN agency that initiated this campaign

","name":"campaign_mcn_name","sample":"test","type":"string","required":null,"key":"kWXzZsp"},{"description":"

Campaign start time, it's unix timestamp in seconds.

","name":"campaign_start_time","sample":"1735870969","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"pZeyTtz"},{"description":"

Campaign end time, it's unix timestamp in seconds.

","name":"campaign_end_time","sample":"1735870969","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"FtDxEPH"}]}]}]}]}
